title: Invitation to social psychology (TEFC)
creator_credit: Harry From, Stanley Milgram and Harper & Row
brief_description: This film introduces the student to the subject by focusing on the subject matter of social psychology, it’s methods of investigation and some of the basic findings. The film looks at a bustling student cafeteria to show how the discipline uses scientific scrutiny. Examines issues such as affiliation, cognitive dissonance, conformity and aggression.
